title: crusted chicken
description: As if breaded chicken wasn’t delicious enough, James Martin adds chopped nuts, parmesan, thyme and lemon zest to the breadcrumbs.
ingredients: 25g/1oz parmesan, freshly grated, plus extra for serving
2 lemons, zested then cut in half
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 heads Little Gem lettuce, leaves separated
